entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -29.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Severn Airport 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -29.2°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -31.9°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
